explains: v. 恢复（某种情况或感受）；使复原，使复位；修复，整修；重新采用，恢复使用；归还
wordGroup: backup and restore 备份与还原

sentences.en: Troops were sent in to restore order.
The police are trying to restore public order.
sentences.cn: 警察正在努力恢复公共秩序。

sentences.en: We will restore her to health but it may take time.
sentences.cn: 我们会让她恢复健康，但这或许需要时间。
